org.huahinframework.core
Class Summarizer

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Reducer<Key,Value,Key,Value>
      org.huahinframework.core.Summarizer
Direct Known Subclasses:
JoinSummarizer
public abstract class Summarizer
extends Reducer<Key,Value,Key,Value>

This class is wrapping the Reducer class. Summarizer will process a given record from Filter.

The framework first calls summarizerSetup(), followed by init() and summarize(Writer) for each Record in the input.

The following is an example to do a count of the WORD that was passed from Filter. Has not specified grouping, will use the default.

Example:

 public class WordSummarizer extends Summarizer {
   public void init() {
   }

   public void summarize(Writer writer)
       throws IOException, InterruptedException {
     int count = 0;
     while (hasNext()) {
       next(writer);
       count++;
     }

     Record emitRecord = new Record();
     emitRecord.addValue("COUNT", count);
     writer.write(emitRecord);
   }

   public void summarizerSetup() {
   }
 }

See Also:
Record, Writer, Summarizer
